page.title: 16CLUBS_GOLF
page.content: Perranporth golf club is situated on the brow of Budnic Hill,hidden beside the sand dunes.There are two course professionals,the Mitchell brothers,a bar for refreshments and a friendly atmosphere.It is also possible to go to the golf shop for most of the equipment. I joined the golf club recently,but I am not the youngest member.They meet in the beginners class.My set of golf clubs cost me Â£12.The eighteen holes are known as the "back nine",and the "front nine".The par for the course is 71 and the course record is 63. Cornwall does not have many golf courses and Perranporth must be one of the most scenic with its view of the sea and surf.I am ten years of age and enjoy golf very much.
